transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Good morning sir, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Very good morning. Theek hai badhiya aap batao.
Executive: Haan bas theek hoon main. Ye pehle dekhiye theek hai na check kiya tha description aapne?
Customer: Uh, maine description nahi maine abhi nahi dekha tha. Main zara kahin busy tha kal bhi haan jab aapne call kiya tha to main matlab aapne message dala tha ki description vagarah check kar lena to us time bhi main kahin side pe tha.
Executive: Side visit karne gaya tha by lead ke sath.
Customer: Achha, by lead vagarah kaisi aa rahi hai abhi aapke paas?
Customer: By lead to theek hai. Abhi lekin wohi hai response jo hai response ka mamla hai thoda sa. By lead to dekho wohi pehle jaisi hai filhaal. By lead mein bas ye hai ki haan jo baat kar rahe hain woh thoda genuine behave sa lag raha hai unka.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Theek hai nahi? Haan lekin abhi response nahi dikha koi zyada.
Executive: To wohi hai na regular follow up lena hoga tab phir pata chalega. Lead to aa rahi hai aapke paas.
Customer: Nahi dekho regular aapko main ek baat bataun abhi maine parson ek lead uthai thi. To ab maine do din se matlab unse call contact karne ki koshish kar raha hoon. To koi response hi nahi hai ab batao.
Customer: Ab kal ke ek main ek matlab pehle inhone maine jinko rakha hua hai unhone call ki thi to unhone kaha ki hum aapke owner se baat karna chahte hain. Theek hai ab main call kar raha tha to call pick nahi ki unhone.
Customer: Ab maine aaj morning mein bhi call ki.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai ab batao.
Executive: Theek hai to ya to whatsapp pe message drop kar do.
Customer: Whatsapp pe bhi whatsapp pe bhi message drop kar diya hua hai aur main main ye zyada tar zaroor karta hoon koi agar baat kare na kare main whatsapp pe zaroor drop karta hoon message.
Customer: Theek hai ye ek cheez mujhe batai hui hai woh main karta hoon woh woh main karta hi karta hoon. Ab lekin dekho saamne se sari baat ye hai ke aadmi baat kare. Theek hai ab aadhe se zyada to ye bolte hain ki abhi hum plan kar rahe hain hum sirf aise hi dekh rahe the ye kar rahe the woh kar rahe the yaar dekho agar aapne sirf aise hi aapne just check out wali aap by lead lene aaye the ya aisa hi kuch karne aaye the to phir to aap yahan galat jagah aa gaye ho.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai aur dekho mujhe to ye lagta hai abhi kal ki main aapko baat bataun parson ki sorry. To ek bande ne jo hai shoe rack ke liye dala hoga. To wahan pe aaya hai book rack.
Customer: Theek hai kal jab maine usko dobara call ki wahan pe shoe rack aa raha tha maine yaar is lead ko uthata hoon dobara matlab phir dhyan nahi raha tha wohi. To jab maine usko call ki to kehne laga yaar maine yahan pe shoe rack balki main IndiaMART walon ko bhi kyun maine unko kaha ki yaar isko shoe rack shoe rack to unhone wahan pe book rack dal diya ab batao.
Executive: [laughter] Ab dekho ye aisi hoti hai.
Executive: Haan haan batao batao batao.
Executive: Jaise kuch kuch is tarah se hoti hai ab ye hai na ki wohi hai ki aap jitna unse baat karoge follow up loge tabhi response zyada increase hoga. Ye to hai ab zaroori nahi hai na ki jitne bhi buyers aa rahe hain sabhi khareedne aaye kuch dekhne bhi aate hain.
Customer: Main aapko ek baat bataun ek baat bataun main aapko main har ek buyer ka kam se kam do se teen din follow up leta hoon.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai ek minute matlab ye nahi hai ki sirf agar ek se chalo baat ho gayi hai to bas main ek hi follow up lunga main har kisi ko do teen call karta hoon ab aap ye aapko bhi itna pata hai ki hum agar ek buyer ko zyada calls karenge matlab maan lo agar hum teen char call karte woh bolega pata nahi woh bhai kaun banda pareshan hai itna hai na to ye zyada cheap ho jata hai cheap hone wali baat ho jati hai chipakne wali ki haan yaar ye to banda like peeche lag gaya theek hai ek call had se hoti hai daily ek call kar rahe hain to utha le banda to bahut hai theek hai balki main to kabhi kabhar do bhi kar deta hoon chalo koi baat nahi do call karte chalo koi woh koi zyada woh nahi hota hai. Ab lekin agar do call karne ke bawajood saamne se koi response na aaye phir phir kya batao.
Executive: [laughter]
Customer: Ab dekho na haan matlab main maine aapko dekho kya bataya jo main aapko bolun na kam se kam main ek nahi ek aadmi nahi main kam se kam do se teen din follow up leta hoon theek hai ab zahir si baat hai dekho agar do se teen din ke follow up lene mein koi koi response na mile to phir kya fayda.
Executive: Hmm ye to sahi keh rahe ho.
Customer: Hai na ab ek woh ke main aaj chalo call ki saamne wale ne response diya to diya aur agar kuch zyada nahi response diya to chhod diya main aisa karta hi nahi hoon. Mujhe lagta hai ki haan main agar isko kar sakta hoon convert to main uske koshish karta hoon lekin saamne wala end mein ek baat aisi kar deta hai ke woh matlab sunne layak hi nahi hoti hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Woh end mein kya bolta hai ki chalo main dekh leta hoon yaar chalo main khud dekh lunga yaar matlab main tujhe price bhi sab kuch sahi de raha hoon hai na to matlab ke bahar jayega humein pata hai loot loot ke hi aayega to loot ke lane wala to hai nahi kyunki market mein itne bade bade khiladi baithe hain jo cheez hum de denge woh saamne wala lootne ke bawajood bhi.
Executive: Condition bataya karo na ya to unko jaise agar in log ko issue hota hai to unse bola karo to jaise aap bahar se loge to aapko is price ka milega abhi hum mein de rahe hain is tarah se kuch bola karo aap jaise to maybe shayad.
Customer: Main ye yahi yahi ye jo aap cheez bata rahe ho main sabse pehle yahi cheez aage rakhta hoon unke ke jaise maan lo ab koi iron jhula leta hai theek hai iron jhula ho gaya garden jhula jisko bolte hain to maine kaha aapne ek maine kaha aapko maloom kya hoga to usne bola ki mujhe jo hai woh jo hai takreeban takreeban 28 30 hazar ka bataya unhone. Maine kaha mam ye cheez hum aapko jo hai 20 hazar mein provide karte hain. Theek hai aur with GST aapko denge baki mam jo hai parcel ka dekho woh aapko amount dena padega. To ab mujhe pata hai woh mujhe kitne ka pad raha hai mere isme kitne bach rahe hain to saamne wala agar 20 hazar sun ke bhi bole ke nahi to phir to phir to woh bilkul hi lichad aadmi ho gaya koi kyunki ye socho matlab maine usko 30 hazar se seedha 10 hazar ka usko maine advantage diya hai hai na matlab maine usko bilkul 10 hazar neeche kar diya maine bola ki nahi aapko itne mein main provide kar dunga jisme GST bhi main usko kar ke de raha hoon hai na 20 hazar with GST kar ke bol raha hoon usko main to agar woh bhi agar woh bole ke nahi ye to mujhe zyada lag raha hai to phir to aap phir aap wahin se khareedoge.
Customer: Agar main online mein aapko zyada de raha hoon to aap wohi karo phir.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur ye ek hi kahani nahi hai main har kisi se jaanta hoon har kisi se achhe se baat karta hoon pehle poochta hoon ke requirement kya hai aapko chahiye kis cheez mein aapko medium chahiye bhari chahiye hai na aapka budget kya hai abhi ek banda hai to usne apna budget bataya mera 25 se 30 hazar ka budget hai theek hai aur mujhe five seater sofa chahiye to maine usko bola dekho yaar jo sofa aap maang rahe ho woh itne mein to provide nahi ho sakta theek hai agar aap budget badhate ho to main phir main aapke liye possible kar sakta hoon kyunki dekho cheez loge to dhanki lo hai na dekho main koi cheez dunga bata ke dunga koi bhi agar aapko ye dega sofa dega to woh aapko bata ke nahi dega woh aapko kaun si lakdi de raha hai theek hai bolega kuch dega kuch aur theek hai woh aapko teko veko kar ke de dega woh bolega yaar yehi lakdi hai baad mein jab woh kharab ho jayega isne bhai ab to bik gaya kyun ji hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Customer ke paas to pahunch gaya ab customer kya ukhad ke thodi dekhega isko scratch kar ke dekhega kya iske neeche kaun si lakdi hai.
Executive: Haan ye baat sahi keh rahe ho.
Customer: Hai na shadi ka shadi ka jo hota hai shadi ke usme agar aap de rahe ho koi cheez to phir to aap achhi do dekho aapne koi concept banaya hua hai aur aap chahiye aapko chahiye carving wali cheez aur badhiya chahiye to phir to aapko dekho usme kharchne padenge aap plain bologe plain mein aapko 30 hazar mein aaram se provide kar dunga main ye cheez hai.
Executive: Ye to sahi keh rahe ho. Ji abhi jisme aapne abhi isko hire kiya na isko abhi haan ji ek ladki hai woh abhi unprofessional hai woh theek hai to woh matlab woh kya kehte hain 1 baje tak woh schooling karti hai uske baad jo hai woh aaye matlab ke free ho jayegi woh to then uske baad aapki main na usse baat karwaunga aap usko samjhana ki dekho aapko karna kya hai aapko kaise aapko ID ko maintain rakhna hai aapko step by step batana.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Achha theek hai. Haan waise to maine isko waise maine isko samjha chuka hoon kitne baje tak free ho jayegi woh? Uh, approx aapke lunch ke baad hi.
Executive: Achha achha theek hai 3 baje tak. Haan haan aap haan haan matlab aap usko 3 baje ke baad call kar lena koi baat nahi aap lunch kar lena aapka aap lunch ke baad call kar sakte ho aap. Haan ek na lead aayi hai aapke paas bed back rest mein deal karte ho?
Customer: Kis mein?
Executive: Bed back rest.
Customer: Haan haan bilkul.
Executive: Badi achhi lead hai Dabhoi Gujarat ki hai quantity 100 piece hai aur iska portable order value 10 to 20 lakh hai aur ye jo buyer hai woh GST verified bhi hai ek baar isko karna contact aap.
Customer: Isko ek second rukiye main dekh leta hoon pehle. Hmm hmm hmm. Maine na filter lagaya tha tab show ho rahi hai aapko.
Customer: Mujhe nahi show ho rahi yahan pe. Sirf ek ghante pehle hi aayi hai lead. Mujhe to yahan pe GST verified hai iska. Haan. Kahan pe kahan pe kya kya cheez utar rahe hain mam?
Executive: Maine dekho main utar rahi hoon order value pe above 50000 pe click karo aur lead type pe GST pe click karo aap phir check karo ek baar. Ek second ek second ye haan ye filter lagaya aapne dekho 100 pieces haan haan Gujarat ki ek baar contact kar lo usse. Okay char saal ek minute dekh lete hain zara 100 pieces. Uske neeche bhi dekho uske neeche bhi 30 sofa cum bed wooden classic style sofa sir. Ye bhi GST verified hai. Suniye suniye ek second ek second mam. Uh dekhiye subscription plan ye dekhiye yahan pe ab mujhe ye aa raha hai you have zero domestic by lead balance. To continue please purchase any D below package. Ye kya cheez hai?
Executive: Kya keh rahe ho?
Customer: Ye abhi maine jo bulk pe aur is pe click kiya tha GST pe theek hai aur ye main contact kar raha hoon to ye to meri you have zero domestic by lead bata raha hai.
Executive: Kya bata raha hai zero main samajh nahi pa rahi hoon kya keh rahe ho aap aapke paas. Mam ye isme likha hua aa raha hai zero by lead zero you have zero by lead domestic by lead.
Executive: Achha zero domestic by lead. Haan aisa kyun?
Executive: Achha to abhi domestic mein maybe aayi nahi hogi isliye woh show nahi kar rahi. Saharanpur ki keh rahe ho na aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi mam Saharanpur ki nahi isme achha UP ki keh rahe ho?
Executive: Ek second rukiye main aapko screenshot bhej raha hoon screenshot bhej raha hoon. Haan bhej do bhej do bhej do. Ek second aap screenshot se samajh jaoge. Haan bhej do. Lijiye. Dekha? Haan isme kya keh rahe ho? Achha you have zero domestic by lead balance. Upar dekhiye please purchase. Ye kya aapne sari consume kar li. Sari consume kar li sari kahan se kar li? Haan matlab jaise is week ki jitni aapko milti hai na woh aapne consume kar li hai theek hai. Ek minute ek minute. Is week ke abhi week shuru to week shuru to Sunday se hua hai na. Kya keh rahe ho? Main keh raha hoon week shuru to Sunday se hua hai na aaj to Monday hi hua hai aaj abhi maine do teen contact kare the. Haan sir sir. Ek second rukiye ek second rukiye. Ab boliye kya keh rahe ho aap? Haan ek minute ruko main check kar rahi hoon main isko. Yaar isme to ye domestic momestic wala ye to koi scene hona hi nahi chahiye. Haan ji. Haan dekho dekho isko. Hmm. Hello? Hello? Haan to main abhi check kar ke batati hoon main aapko contact. Ji ji kariye check bataiye. Haan aapko. Theek hai ji aap check kariye bataiye. Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good responses on buyleads.

- Customer is unable to contact some buyleads.

- Customer is seeing book rack instead of shoe rack.

- Customer has zero domestic buylead balance.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested to drop message on WhatsApp.

- Executive suggested to follow up regularly.

- Executive said she will check and inform about buylead balance.

- Executive will get the customer in touch with new hire.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and inform about buylead balance.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, follow up, response, domestic buylead, gst
